overview_of_class:
This is a class for people who have an interest in entrepreneurship. It is very fast paced, requires a considerable amount of work, working mainly in teams. For the right student it can be a very meaningful class. But, you need to make sure this is the right class for you. Make sure you will have no conflicts and that you are willing to put in the considerable effort required.

Application Link - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf177Sk3NnlONWJN8kOxygVWLRS32X-2C8DgFDGRfFl9UOqlA/viewform?c=0&w=1
name: Principles of Entrepreneurship
title: MEAS ENTREP 225-0-01 Principles of Entrepreneurship
enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Registration is restricted: Students cannot take ENTREP/IEMS 325-0 prior to taking this course. Please contact the department with any further questions.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
